1.content:
Hello, Everybody And Welcome to The Care Bear Adventures.

Join The Care Bears and Care Bear cousins and Battle against the forces of Uncaring.

Or If you enjoy being evil and would love to take over the world, Join or be No Heart, Dark Heart or The Evil spirit or any other OC Uncaring being.

Which would you rather be?
1.title: Welcome

11.content: Who is The main Character in This?
11.title: A Care Bear

115.content: What other Care Bear shall be the one?
115.title: More Care Bears

choices: Her appetite was slowly increasing(she only eats human food not people)
She turns evil for a while
She stays good for now but becomes evil later
11531.content:
It was a typical average day up above the Earth in the realm only known as Care-A-Lot as most of the friendly colorful bears were simply relaxing as for once there was no sort of trouble on Earth,no kids in trouble or problems with the Care Bears old enemy No Heart so the bears did what they normally did on just a lazy day: watering plants,swinging on the swingset,taking walks or just riding around in those odd cloud cars.

Cheer Bear,the bright hot pink colored bear with a rainbow on her tummy was about to take as journey to Earth to visit some kids the bears had helped out on one of their previous missions and flew down to Chicago,IL in her cloud car landing in a secluded spot and was just about to visit the kids to check up on them when she noticed some of the adult citizens looking a bit down,literally every person the little bear came across seemed completely unhappy or had a bored,gloomy expression on their faces.

"What's going on here?" Cheer Bear thought as she continued her stroll through the human city as even the animals and plant life seemed miserable and just stood there like zombies. "Why is everyone so sad and unhappy looking?" She thought she tried talking to a few people but none of them seemed to want to talk or seemly wasn't able to as their mouths were hanging open without any words coming out. "What is going on here? Is it No-Heart again?" She said to herself as she doubted it there weren't any of the evil wizard's shadowy minions flying around causing misery or sorrow anywhere or Beastly for that matter so what was going on?

Cheer Bear received the answer when she came to a lone warehouse at the end of one intersection and upon entering without permission she saw a lone creepy looking man standing beside a odd looking machine that looked like it came from the 50s.


"Umm hello there sir. I was walking around this town and noticed everyone is in a sadden state do you know what is going on here?"

"Ah, you must be one of those Care Bear creatures I have been hearing about." He said in the typical evil tone of voice with a sinister grin. "And you happened to stumble upon my plan have you?"

"Huh? Y-you mean you did all this why?" Cheer Bear blurted out in alarm as the apparent villain of this story laughed evilly.

"Because I,the soon to be great Mr Unkind am tired of all these happy,annoying people I'm surrounded by all the time! It's unfair that I had a cold,miserable childhood and am still living the life of a miser while everyone else is happy and lives carefree lives with their friends and families so to settle the score I created my Emotion-Eraser machine to show people all the sorrow and misery I felt over the years!" He cried evilly.


"But that's not fair! You can't cause misery and sadness to people just because you yourself had a unhappy childhood experience....." The pink bear said but he again laughed evilly.

"Oh spare me the usual friendship is might speeches bear. It's not going to work on me, Neither will your little Care Bear Stare trick as I'm immune to happy emotions bear." The villain said as he got behind his machine and pressed a button on the control panel and two metal hands grabbed the little pink bear who was utterly helpless as she was strapped to a table.

"Wait what are you going to do?" She asked fearfully.

"You annoying little bears have been nothing but trouble always with your constant speeches and friendly,kind nature..it's sickening! So here have a taste of my Evil-Side Beam!" As he pressed a another button as the little pink bear gasped as instead of turning her into a big meanie,she actually began growing slowly in size as the man's eyes were raised in shock.

"Wha-what the...ohhh silly me that was the wrong button,there was the Matter Expander ray I was saving that for another possible evil scheme." He said to himself but Cheer Bear was panicking like crazy as she continued to slowly grow breaking through her restraints with ease.

"OH NO! PLEASE STOP THIS!!" She cried out as her furry self began filling up the already small warehouse and the evil villain was suddenly having second thoughts about this.

"Uh oh.....I didn't expect this to happen that bear is growing out of control....I better get out of here." As he made a quick dash for the door just as Cheer Bear's head slowly burst through the wooden cottage as it exploded as she finally stopped growing at 50 feet tall.

"Oh no this is completely horrible! I-I'm a monster." The bear cried out as she stared around her now tiny surroundings everything from the houses,trees,cars and especially people all looked like children' toys to her.

"Ohhhhhh,this is so scary. What am I to do?" She thought just as the pink Care Bear iconically called Cheer Bear wasn't feeling so cheerful as she only hoped none of the other Care Bears could see her gigantic height from Care-A-Lot she was faced with a much bigger problem which was.......
11531.title: Cheer Bear

14.content:
You have decided to join the forces of Uncaring and Evil and Love to hear of Your Uncaring Plans to take over the world.

Who is the Conquering enemy of the Care bears?
14.title: Uncaring Enemy

choices: Tender Heart Bear,the so-called leader of the bears
Grumpy Bear since the title is in his name after all
145.content:
I'm going with the boy Dark Heart since he's obliviously their most popular and dangerous foe.


This takes place during the events of the second film of course as the shape-shifting boy or Dark Heart was planning to rid the known world of all kindness and goodness and to do that first he had to find a way to get rid of those annoying 'colorful' bears of friendship and feelings.

Alone sitting in his unknown cave filled with gleaming actual treasure,Dark Heart was frantically pondering how to get rid of the so-called 'Defenders of Feelings'

"Hmmmm now how should I make those little happy furballs disappear forever? Maybe I should just go with my original plan and use one of those kids down at that summer camp and lure them into a trap....no that may take too long..." As he wandered around in circles until it finally came to him.

"Of course it's so oblivious! Why didn't I think of it before? Those bears are so completely gulliable,so carefree if I use my magic to turn one of them evil and mean like me then eventually they'll destroy each other or else kids and people on Earth will stop trusting them and they will be the 'Little Fuzz Balls of Sorrow' sounds like a good idea." As the boy came to a complete stop smiling sinisterly.

"Yes that's a very excellent plan but wait-Both True Heart Bear and Noble Heart Horse are unlikely to turn bad so looks like I'll have to use one of the younger bears or cousins but which one? Then he decides on.................
145.title: Dark Heart OR the Evil Spirit

info.brief_description: Join The Care Bears and Cousins or Join the forces of Evil and become Uncaring!
info.description:
Hello, Ladies and Gentlemen.

Welcome to my new changed interactive story: The Care Bear Adventures.

In This Interactive, Join The Care Bears against their Uncaring Enemies.

If You love being Evil, Join or become No Heart or Any Uncaring being from the 80's to take over the world or universe.

Rules:

1. Perfect for all ages
2. You can be A Care Bear or Cousin
3. If you love being evil, Feel free to play No Heart or any Uncaring Being.
4. Everything Must not be inappropriate.
5. You can also be the evil spirit.
6. No vore, Gore, Diapers, and Weight gain.
7. Enjoy!

I have been inspired to do this by my Friend of DA Named Shrekrulez or Adam.

https://www.deviantart.com/shrekrulez

Or If you would just most likely to read his care bear work that he gave me permission to post on FF.net.

Enjoy them at my FF Account.

https://www.fanfiction.net/u/7032097/niccunningham

I hope these inspire you too, For my story and Adam's Care Bear Work on DA.
